original_text:
Almighty Sparta
Probabilmente tutti conoscete la storia dei trecento spartani che da soli affrontarono il temibile esercito persiano, condotti dall’eroico Leonida. Ebbene, la slot Almighty Sparta ci porta proprio lì, in quell’epoca e nei luoghi della battaglia.
La slot Almighty Sparta è prodotta da Endorphina e presenta 10 linee di pagamento dislocate in un display in formato 3×5. Come vedremo nel corso dell’articolo, questa slot presenta una funzione free spin simboli speciali.
Grafica della slot machine
La grafica della slot  Almighty Sparta ci mette di fronte ad una sorta di finestra in stile classico sul mare, la famosa scogliera sulla quale sbarcarono i persiani e dove inizialmente trovarono un mare agitato che fece infrangere alcune delle loro navi sulle rocce.
Tra i simboli troviamo, oltre il grande Leonida, anche l’oracolo (la donna), lo sgorbio (anche se dalla figura non sembrerebbe) che tradì Leonida, spade, lance, scudi e il re persiano. A questi si aggiungono gli immancabili simboli del Poker.
Complessivamente, la grafica è piacevole, accompagnata da un sottofondo musicale di tensione, come di attesa per il conflitto. Difatti, come vedremo tra poco, qualcosa si scatena.
Le funzioni e i bonus della slot Almighty Sparta
I simboli speciali della slot sono due:

Scudo, che rappresenta lo scatter del gioco. Se si visualizzano da 2 a 5 scatter sul display in uno stesso giro, anche in ordine sparso, si ottengono altri premi.
Leonida, il simbolo jolly del gioco. Questo può apparire andando a ricoprire fino a 3 caselle sullo stesso rullo.

Le funzioni speciali della slot  Almighty Sparta sono due

Giri gratis: visualizzando 3 o più scatter (gli scudi) in uno stesso giro si ottengono 20 giri gratis con un moltiplicatore x4. Altri giri gratis possono essere vinti durante i free games.
Gamble: il gioco della scommessa si può attivare dopo ciascun giro semplice vincente. Si può raddoppiare la propria vincita fino a 10 volte. Per farlo, occorre battere la carta del dealer, scegliendo la propria tra 4 carte differenti.

Valutazione della slot  Almighty Sparta
E’ una bella slot, non c’è che dire. Piacevole come le altre slot prodotte da Endorphina di cui abbiamo parlato in altre recensioni, ma con un tocco in più. Infatti, nella slot  Almighty Sparta vi sono due simboli speciali differenti e non un unico simbolo scatter/jolly. Inoltre, i giri gratis sono 20 anziché 10. La veste grafica è rilassante e coinvolgente allo stesso modo. L’audio fa calare l’atmosfera di guerra e siete liberi di attivarlo o meno dalle opzioni (le tre linee sulla sinistra del display).
La percentuale di RTP della slot Almighty Sparta è di circa il 96%. La puntata minima è di 0,01€, la massima di 100€ per giro.

raw_translation.response:
Possible translation:

Almighty Sparta
You probably all know the story about the three hundred Spartans who stood alone against the formidable Persian army, led by the heroic Leonidas. Well, the slot game Almighty Sparta takes us right there, to that era and places of the battle.
Produced by Endorphina, Almighty Sparta features 10 paylines on a 3×5 display. As we will see in this article, this slot also has a special symbols free spin function.
Slot machine graphics
The graphics of Almighty Sparta put us in front of a sort of classic window overlooking the sea, the famous cliff where the Persians landed and where they initially found a stormy sea that caused some of their ships to crash on the rocks.
Among the symbols we find, besides the great Leonidas, also the oracle (the woman), the traitor (although it doesn't seem so from the figure) who betrayed Leonidas, swords, lances, shields and the Persian king. To these we add the inevitable symbols of Poker.
Overall, the graphics are pleasing, accompanied by a tense background music, as if waiting for the conflict. In fact, as we'll see shortly, something is unleashed.
Functions and bonuses of Almighty Sparta slot
The special symbols of the slot game are two:

Shield, which represents the game scatter. If 2 to 5 scatters are displayed on the screen in a same spin, even in any order, additional prizes are obtained.
Leonidas, the wild symbol of the game. This can appear covering up to 3 boxes on the same reel.

The special functions of Almighty Sparta slot are two

Free spins: by displaying 3 or more scatters (shields) in a same spin, 20 free spins with a x4 multiplier are obtained. More free spins can be won during the free games.
Gamble: the betting game can be activated after each winning simple spin. Your prize can be doubled up to 10 times. To do so, you must beat the dealer's card, choosing yours among 4 different cards.

Evaluation of Almighty Sparta slot
It's a nice slot game, no doubt about it. Enjoyable like the other slots produced by Endorphina that we've reviewed before, but with an extra touch. Indeed, in Almighty Sparta slot there are two different special symbols, not just one scatter/wild symbol. Moreover, the free spins are 20 instead of 10. The visual style is relaxing and immersive at the same time. The audio lowers the war atmosphere and you are free to turn it on or off from the options (the three lines on the left of the screen).
The RTP percentage of Almighty Sparta slot is about 96%. The minimum bet is 0.01€, the maximum is 100€ per spin. As experienced gamblers, we can appreciate the balance of risk and reward, the seamless gameplay, and the attention to details in this slot game. May fortune favor us in our next battles.

raw_translation.response:
Experience the thrilling battles of ancient Sparta with Endorphina's Almighty Sparta slot game. This 3x5 format slot machine boasts 10 paylines and special symbols that will surely keep you on the edge of your seat. Graphics-wise, this slot game takes you to the cliffs where the feared Persian army landed on Spartan shores. Expect symbols like King Leonidas, the infamous Oracle, swords, shields, lances, and even the treacherous Ephialtes to appear on your reels.

But what makes Almighty Sparta unique are its special symbols. There's the scatter symbol - a shield - which unlocks other prizes when you hit at least two of them scattered all over the display in a single round. And then there's the joker symbol - Leonidas himself - which can cover up to three spots on a single reel. With every spin, you'll feel the tension build up, and it's only a matter of time before you get to activate the slot's special functions.

When you hit three or more shield scatter symbols, you'll unlock 20 free spins with a 4x multiplier. Keep an eye out for more chances to win free spins during the free game rounds. And if you feel like taking risks, try the gamble game function after every successful round. You have the chance to double your winnings up to ten times by selecting a card that beats the dealer.

All in all, Almighty Sparta is a fantastic slot game from Endorphina with an RTP of approximately 96%. With a minimum bet of 0.01€ and a maximum of 100€ per spin, this game is perfect for experienced gamblers looking for an extra challenge. The graphics are stunning, accompanied by a soundtrack that will make you feel like you're right in the middle of a battlefield. So why not give Almighty Sparta a spin today and see if you can emerge victorious, just like the legendary Spartan warriors of old?

Review: Possible translation:

Almighty Sparta
You probably all know the story about the three hundred Spartans who stood alone against the formidable Persian army, led by the heroic Leonidas. Well, the slot game Almighty Sparta takes us right there, to that era and places of the battle.
Produced by Endorphina, Almighty Sparta features 10 paylines on a 3×5 display. As we will see in this article, this slot also has a special symbols free spin function.
Slot machine graphics
The graphics of Almighty Sparta put us in front of a sort of classic window overlooking the sea, the famous cliff where the Persians landed and where they initially found a stormy sea that caused some of their ships to crash on the rocks.
Among the symbols we find, besides the great Leonidas, also the oracle (the woman), the traitor (although it doesn't seem so from the figure) who betrayed Leonidas, swords, lances, shields and the Persian king. To these we add the inevitable symbols of Poker.
Overall, the graphics are pleasing, accompanied by a tense background music, as if waiting for the conflict. In fact, as we'll see shortly, something is unleashed.
Functions and bonuses of Almighty Sparta slot
The special symbols of the slot game are two:

Shield, which represents the game scatter. If 2 to 5 scatters are displayed on the screen in a same spin, even in any order, additional prizes are obtained.
Leonidas, the wild symbol of the game. This can appear covering up to 3 boxes on the same reel.

The special functions of Almighty Sparta slot are two

Free spins: by displaying 3 or more scatters (shields) in a same spin, 20 free spins with a x4 multiplier are obtained. More free spins can be won during the free games.
Gamble: the betting game can be activated after each winning simple spin. Your prize can be doubled up to 10 times. To do so, you must beat the dealer's card, choosing yours among 4 different cards.

Evaluation of Almighty Sparta slot
It's a nice slot game, no doubt about it. Enjoyable like the other slots produced by Endorphina that we've reviewed before, but with an extra touch. Indeed, in Almighty Sparta slot there are two different special symbols, not just one scatter/wild symbol. Moreover, the free spins are 20 instead of 10. The visual style is relaxing and immersive at the same time. The audio lowers the war atmosphere and you are free to turn it on or off from the options (the three lines on the left of the screen).
The RTP percentage of Almighty Sparta slot is about 96%. The minimum bet is 0.01€, the maximum is 100€ per spin. As experienced gamblers, we can appreciate the balance of risk and reward, the seamless gameplay, and the attention to details in this slot game. May fortune favor us in our next battles.

Almighty Sparta
You probably all know the story about the three hundred Spartans who stood alone against the formidable Persian army, led by the heroic Leonidas. Well, the slot game Almighty Sparta takes us right there, to that era and places of the battle.
Produced by Endorphina, Almighty Sparta features 10 paylines on a 3×5 display. As we will see in this article, this slot also has a special symbols free spin function.
Slot machine graphics
The graphics of Almighty Sparta put us in front of a sort of classic window overlooking the sea, the famous cliff where the Persians landed and where they initially found a stormy sea that caused some of their ships to crash on the rocks.
Among the symbols we find, besides the great Leonidas, also the oracle (the woman), the traitor (although it doesn't seem so from the figure) who betrayed Leonidas, swords, lances, shields and the Persian king. To these we add the inevitable symbols of Poker.
Overall, the graphics are pleasing, accompanied by a tense background music, as if waiting for the conflict. In fact, as we'll see shortly, something is unleashed.
Functions and bonuses of Almighty Sparta slot
The special symbols of the slot game are two:

Shield, which represents the game scatter. If 2 to 5 scatters are displayed on the screen in a same spin, even in any order, additional prizes are obtained.
Leonidas, the wild symbol of the game. This can appear covering up to 3 boxes on the same reel.

The special functions of Almighty Sparta slot are two

Free spins: by displaying 3 or more scatters (shields) in a same spin, 20 free spins with a x4 multiplier are obtained. More free spins can be won during the free games.
Gamble: the betting game can be activated after each winning simple spin. Your prize can be doubled up to 10 times. To do so, you must beat the dealer's card, choosing yours among 4 different cards.

Evaluation of Almighty Sparta slot
It's a nice slot game, no doubt about it. Enjoyable like the other slots produced by Endorphina that we've reviewed before, but with an extra touch. Indeed, in Almighty Sparta slot there are two different special symbols, not just one scatter/wild symbol. Moreover, the free spins are 20 instead of 10. The visual style is relaxing and immersive at the same time. The audio lowers the war atmosphere and you are free to turn it on or off from the options (the three lines on the left of the screen).
The RTP percentage of Almighty Sparta slot is about 96%. The minimum bet is 0.01€, the maximum is 100€ per spin. As experienced gamblers, we can appreciate the balance of risk and reward, the seamless gameplay, and the attention to details in this slot game. May fortune favor us in our next battles.
